title: Phase 6: Performance Optimizations - Implement fast loops, lookup tables, batch reads
description: Implement fast loops and loop unrolling. Optimize lookup table generation for common cases. Add batch reading for multi-byte patterns. Profile and benchmark against Rust implementation. Memory usage optimization.

title: Phase 4: Macro/Annotation Processor - Create macro that reads enum annotations
description: Create macro that reads enum annotations. Parse @[Logos::Token], @[Logos::Regex], @[Logos::Skip] attributes. Generate lexer class with DFA-based next_token method. Implement compile-time error reporting for invalid patterns. Test with simple token definitions.

title: Design and implement Lexer class with proper generic constraints
description: Complete Lexer implementation with proper handling of generic token types. Need to solve Crystal's limitation with associated types. Options: 1) Use additional type parameters, 2) Use module interface with class methods, 3) Different architecture. Create working prototype with mock token type.

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Implement core Logos types (Source, Lexer, Span)
description: Set up Crystal project structure mirroring Rust layout. Implement Logos::Source trait and implementations for String/Bytes. Create Lexer base class with iterator interface. Implement Span type and basic position tracking. Write basic spec tests for core functionality.

title: Phase 7: Test Porting and Validation - Port Rust tests, examples, benchmarks
description: Port all Rust integration tests to Crystal spec. Port UI tests (compile-fail scenarios). Port example applications (brainfuck, calculator, JSON). Create comprehensive documentation. Performance benchmarking suite.

title: Phase 2: Pattern Compilation - Design pattern representation and regex parsing
description: Design pattern representation (literal tokens, regex patterns). Implement token literal compilation to byte sequences. Create regex parser (or adapt Crystal's regex syntax). Build NFA construction from patterns. Implement priority system for disambiguation.

title: Phase 3: DFA Construction - Port subset construction algorithm and optimizations
description: Port subset construction algorithm from Rust. Implement DFA optimization passes (dead state elimination, state merging). Create byte classification and lookup table generation. Design state machine representation for code generation. Add validation for no backtracking, no empty matches.

title: Port logos Rust library to Crystal
description: Comprehensive port of the logos lexer generator from Rust to Crystal, maintaining API semantics and performance characteristics. See plan.md for detailed implementation roadmap.

title: Phase 5: Advanced Features - Implement callback system, extras, custom errors
description: Implement callback system with block support. Add extras functionality for lexer context. Support custom error types and error propagation. Implement Filter and FilterResult equivalents. Add logos::skip helper function.
